meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Distribute</kanji> yourself <kanji>accidentally</kanji> to <kanji>someone</kanji>. That person ended up becoming your <vocabulary>spouse</vocabulary>. You distributed yourself to one person a little too much, it seems.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
